area: the town of jerico is a peacful farming, non religous, town that believes in kindness and second chances. the style of the town is very anceient aisa with one story buildings made of stone and wood.

room: a busy street full of venders and towns people going about their buisness, pags shop is around the corner
characters: welcome to the town of jerico, here you will find lots of boring things to do and people to talk to. but this shop over here is quite intresting. and the old man who runs is quite the character, ha ha ha.
structures: a doorway to the magical place of discounted items
events: thanks for opening my shop, shall we go inside
a key which holds many fond memories of opening this shop
pags shop has opened for the day

room: a small oak cabin that smells of honey
characters: I hope you are enjoing this town so far and all it has to offer.

room: the scream came from a little girl that has been knocked over by a knight
characters:
i do not want to talk to her...
 she is tall and very buff, no getting past her. she tries to apologize to the little girl but her mom isent having it. the mom states that this is what knight do best, prey on the innocent
